text: Marco Mendicino (; born July 28, 1973) is a Canadian politician. He has been the Minister of Public Safety since October 26, 2021. He is a member of the Liberal Party. Mendicino represents Eglintonâ€”Lawrence in the House of Commons since 2015. He was the Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship from 2019 to 2021. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian lawyers Category:Politicians from Ontario Category:York University alumni
